data.title: GolfCraft minigolf
data.description: Golfcraft is a minigolf game (made by Eibriel and Pablo) where players can gather materials to craft items and earn resources passively. The game has three main game modes (training, competition, and tournament) which usually consist of sending a ball to a target. Players can also make use of an in-game level editor. https://unve.rs/readGolfCraft

data.title: Antrom RPG (Dice Masters)
data.description: @KnightsOfAntrom, the ultimate role-playing game that will challenge you to farm, craft, and fight your way to the top. Explore a vast and immersive world filled with danger and opportunity at every turn. Gather resources, upgrade your gear, and face off against fearsome enemies as you level up and unlock new abilities and skills. Are you ready to rise to the challenge and become an Antrom legend? Join us and find out!

data.title: Wilderness P2E
data.description: Wilderness P2E is a thrilling fantasy role playing game that offers players the chance to earn real rewards through its unique play to earn mechanic. In this game, players can collect utility NFTs that are wearable in the Decentraland metaverse and provide bonuses that can be earned through gameplay. As players explore the vast wilderness and complete quests, they will have the opportunity to earn these NFTs, which can be used to unlock powerful abilities and boost their character's stats. With a wide range of NFTs to collect, players can tailor their character to their own playstyle and dominate in combat. In addition to the exciting gameplay and the chance to earn rewards, Wilderness P2E also offers stunning graphics and a fully immersive world to explore. Join forces with other players and form a party to take on challenging boss battles and conquer the wilderness together. Don't miss out on the chance to experience the unique play to earn mechanic and earn real rewards in Wilderness P2E. Start your journey today and discover the power of utility NFTs. Visit our website at : www.wildernessp2e.com

data.title: Soul Magic
data.description: Soul Magic is a magic fantasy role play game and the story surrounds the magic school of Elswyth. Collect ores and magic stones from mining, farming plants and discover through digging. You can also trade resources for Gold Midas, the currency in the world. Soul can be recovered from meditation and will be consumed while conducting activities. We are now running the Admission Carnival. Players who pass the admission quiz will be awarded the Sunstaff, a magic staff that gives you the ability to cast spells!

data.title: Ethermon District - Player & Guild House
data.description: Ethermon is a role-playing, play-to-earn game that offers a decentralized world of Ether monsters built on the Ethereum blockchain. It was the first PVP battle game on Ethereum, minting the first collection of Ether monsters NFTs or “Mons” in 2017. The game was taken over by its most dedicated players and an expanded team in 2019. Ethermon is now an entire game ecosystem, spanning from gameplay and a marketplace on Ethermon Classic to an MMO-inspired game in the Ethermon District — the largest gaming district in Decentraland.

data.description: Entertainment building that allows Creators and Fans can forge stronger relationships together in a next-level experience. Colorverse Tower includes a private room, bar, game room, radio studio and more—there is also a rooftop event space for live events! With all these facilities waiting to be enjoyed, Creators can create different events without any hassle and Fans can enjoy the virtual adventures while enhancing their experience in Decentraland. Now is the time to start exploring!

data.title: META G by RSP META
data.description: A floating NFT gallery nexus with an infinity helix platform cycling through the viewing platforms. The space features tessellated social grounds surrounding the building known as voxel plaza which acts as a space for play and socialisation. The gallery features a secret VIP space which can only be accessed via a secret entrance, which invites visitors to explore and discover new routes in the nexus. The building features a breath skin facade, emulating nature as the building breathes and shifts. Music: City Lights by Ghostrifter Official | https://soundcloud.com/ghostrifter-official

data.title: Bandwagon Pixel Party ft. Slot Machine
data.description:
Slot Machine is the latest act to grace the virtual stage of Bandwagon Pixel Party, a metaverse concert series happening on 11 Sep at 11 AM (GMT +8) / Sat, 10 Sep at 11 PM EST.

In case you missed out on the previous events, Bandwagon Pixel Party is our foray into the metaverse in partnership with Mettaverse and co-presented with Ebenex. This series will give music fans a new virtual experience and a chance to discover fresh music from Asia.

We'll also be bringing back our Mine2Earn and Drag Racing games. Test your skills and speed to be on the leaderboard as one of the top 10 fastest racers to win wearables! Or participate in Mine2Earn to claim your very own NFT.

Attendees can enjoy live music, contests to win exclusive wearables, and a chance to collect your very own NFT Attendance Pass (limited to 500).
